title: Proseminar in Literary Studies
description:
The proseminar in literary studies introduces students to the comparative
study of literary form. This year, we will focus on Shakespeare’s plays and
poetry as a springboard to explore the theoretical and literary critical
approaches from around the world.
prerequisite: YCC1111 Literature and Humanities 1 and YCC1112 Literature and Humanities 2  or with the permission of the instructor.
preclusion: Previous iterations of YHU3210 Proseminar in Literary Studies
